long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
stellarficate your websites. 

With this extension you can either monitor all payments in the stellar blockchain or only a specific address. All payments will be visualized in real time on any webpage by a little rocket along with the payment informations (amount, asset type and memo text)

this extension will be updated with new funny little features centered around the stellar lumens univers!

Cheers

V. 1.0.0
Big version jump with fixes and visual corrections. The css of the popup is adapted to the new standards and the stellar api is checked and still working fine.

V. 0.0.2
Track one more asset beside XLM
